task:
IMPLEMENT: ENGINE/MODEL SURFACING IN UI

The dashboard needs to show PER-NODE which inference engine and model is being used.

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Each node/worker card in the UI should display:
   - Engine type: 'CLAUDE' or 'GROQ' with visual indicator (badge/icon)
   - Model name: e.g., 'claude-sonnet-4' or 'llama-3.3-70b'
   - Selection reason: Why this engine was chosen (e.g., 'Complex task', 'Budget optimization')

2. Real-time updates via SSE/WebSocket showing:
   - Engine switches during exe
